name: Weepinbell
description: It spits out POISONPOWDER to immobilize the enemy and then finishes it with a spray of ACID.

abilities.name: Chlorophyll
abilities.effect: This Pokémon's Speed is doubled during strong sunlight.  This bonus does not count as a stat modifier.

abilities.name: Gluttony
abilities.effect: This Pokémon eats any held Berry triggered by low HP when it falls below 50% of its HP, regardless of the Berry's usual threshold.
abilities.description: Encourages the early use of a held Berry.
